ygData.subject: Re : [neat] Any Prior Applications of NEAT In Which The Genotype Itself Is The Output?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi,   A recent work, where a NEAT optimized CPPN is used to   - 1) generate the genotype (HyperNEAT approach)   - 2) alter the phenotype in an iterative way

Hi,
=C2=A0 A recent work, where a NEAT optimized CPPN is used to 
=C2=A0 - =
1) generate the genotype (HyperNEAT approach) 

=C2=A0 - 2) alter the pheno=
type in an iterative way


A Study on Scalable Representations for Evolutio=
nary Optimization of Ground Structures
=C2=A0http://www.mitpressjournals.or=
g/doi/pdf/10.1162/EVCO_a_00054

Is anybody aware of a prior application of NEAT, in which the actual i=
ndividual structure is the output, and NOT the activation output of same? T=
he structure of the individual being passed for objective function evaluati=
on and evolution by NEAT?

Thanks,
Andy
